page.name: Example: Share the goal in multiple waysÂ
page.content:
• State the goal throughout your instructional session
  • Provide models or examples of the goal setting process 
  • Have students restate the goal as they understand it with their peers
  • Use visuals such as videos, posters, slides, graphic organizers, virtual discussion boards or posters it in the classroom to assist with goal setting
  • Add the goal to the top of any/all handouts
  • Periodically stop the lesson or activity and ask learners to share out loud what the learning goal is
